short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage, view, edit, and protect cookies like EditThisCookie.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily take control of your browser cookies with this powerful and intuitive tool, inspired by the functionality of EditThisCookie. This extension allows you to manage, view, edit, and protect cookies directly from your browser, giving you full transparency and control over your online experience.

Key Features:
View Detailed Cookie Information: Quickly access all the essential details about cookies set by any website.
Edit and Update Cookies: Modify cookies in real-time, allowing you to change values or delete specific ones effortlessly.
Add or Create New Cookies: Easily add new cookies to customize your browsing behavior.
Protect Sensitive Cookies: Lock important cookies to prevent accidental deletion or changes.
Delete Unwanted Cookies: Remove cookies that you no longer need, enhancing your privacy and browser performance.
Perfect for developers, testers, and privacy-conscious users who need precise control over browser cookies.
